itemDisplayName: Deploy Windows VM configure windows featurtes SSL DSC
description: This template allows you to deploy a Windows VM, configure windows features like IIS/Web Role, .Net, Custom loggin, windows auth, application initialization, download application deployment packages, URL Rewrite & SSL configuration using DSC and Azure Key Vault
summary: This template allows you to deploy a Windows VM, configure several windows features, .Net, download application deployment packages, URL Rewrite & SSL configuration using DSC and Azure Key Vault
